features: EASILY FILL FROM THE FRONT.The FrontFill water reservoir and swing-open brew basket provide easy access under cabinets,so it's simpler to add water and coffee grounds.The swing-out brew basket opens from the front and is designed for easy cleaning.Filter type:Reusable

WAKE-UP READY COFFEE WITH EASY-TOUCH PROGRAMMING: It's easy to program the coffee maker and clock. Use Easy-Touch programming to set the Hamilton Beach coffee maker up to 24 hours ahead so hot coffee is ready in the morning when you wake up.
AUTO SHUTOFF: This drip coffee maker automatically shuts off after 2 hours for peace of mind. Never worry about leaving home with the coffee maker on again.

CUSTOMIZE BREW STRENGTH. Use the Select-a-Brew brew-strength selector on the programmable coffee maker to set your coffee's brew strength to match your preference or mood. Choose regular, bold or 1-4 cup options.
KNOW WHEN IT’S TIME TO CLEAN: The coffee maker gives you cleaning reminders to let you know when it’s time to run the self-cleaning cycle. Fits Hamilton Beach 80674R water filters (sold separately).
body.description: The Hamilton Beach programmable easy access coffee maker puts an end to maneuvering of a countertop coffee maker. You can fill the water tank from the front, instead of the back. This coffee maker takes up less space but still makes up to 12 cups.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Programmable Easy Access 12 Cup Coffee Maker Finally, a coffee maker that can stay tucked under a cabinet when in use. The Hamilton Beach FrontFill 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker is easy to fill from the front with a FrontFill water reservoir and swing-open brew basket for coffee grounds. Now you can fill the water tank from the front of the machine, instead of the back. The swing-out brew basket is easier to fill and keep clean than a top-load basket. AutoPause & Pour lets you pour yourself the first cup fast while coffee is still brewing, and you'll have peace of mind with automatic shutoff. Wake-up ready coffee with Easy-Touch programming Easily fill from the front Ensure your machine is brewing the best-tasting coffee with automatic cleaning cycle reminder Compact design takes up less space but still makes up to 12 cups Water reservoir fits Hamilton Beach 80674R water filters (sold separately)

Easily Fill from the Front The FrontFill water reservoir and swing-open brew basket are designed for easy access under cabinets, so it's simpler to add water and coffee grounds. The swing-out brew basket opens from the front quickly and is designed for easy cleaning. Wake-up Ready Coffee with Easy-Touch Programming It's easy to program the coffee maker and clock. Use Easy-Touch programming to set the Hamilton Beach coffee maker up to 24 hours ahead so hot coffee is ready in the morning when you wake up. Know When it's Time to Clean The coffee maker gives you cleaning reminders to let you know when it’s time to run the self-cleaning cycle. Fits Hamilton Beach 80674R water filters (sold separately).

First Cup Fast With AutoPause & Pour, you can pour yourself a cup while coffee is still brewing. Customize Brew Strength Use the Select-a-Brew brew-strength selector on the programmable coffee maker to set your coffee's brew strength to match your preference or mood. Choose regular, bold or 1-4 cup options. Easy-View Water Window Makes it easy to fill water to the right level.

Programmable Easy Access Coffee Maker Programmable Coffee Maker, Flexbrew 2-Way Brewer FlexBrew Single-Serve Coffee Maker for K-Cups and Ground Coffee 12-Cup Coffee Maker, Programmable Brewstation Dispensing Coffee Machine Programmable ✓ ✓ ✓ Includes 12 Cup Coffee Carafe ✓ ✓ No Carafe Multi-Cup Dispensing ✓ Single Serve & Cafafe Flexibility ✓ Single Serve Brew With or Without K-Cups ✓ ✓ Brew Strength Options 3 2 1 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hamilton Beach is my favorite coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: This is now the second Hamilton Beach coffee maker I've had and I have to say the ease of use and the taste of the coffee and the general quality of these machines so far is unsurpassed for me. This past Christmas I decided to replace my still working not having any problems Hamilton Beach because it had hard water stains and it was going on a few years so I thought I was upgrading. Boy was I wrong I bought a GE coffee maker which started malfunctioning within a week of use so I decided to return it and buy myself the slightly upgraded version of my old Hamilton Beach which is this one. Also the ease of filling it with water from the front instead of from the top makes a big difference for my mom who sometimes has trouble with her shoulder and is a small woman so that was a little tall for her on the GE. The programmable function always works perfectly and the fact that it's got the settings for whether you want a boulder cup of coffee is also great. The coffee comes out hot and delicious every time I cannot complain and I don't see myself deviating from this brand again. Really a good buy for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very well built and ready to use. It's everything you'd expect from a coffee maker and more. I especially like the front opening for pouring water in. I never use the rear except for cleaning.The 2 hr auto off is great, and every coffee maker should have that.Strong and well built. We use it 2 or 3 times each foy for a month now and it still seems just as good as brand new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Untold details Hamilton vs Atomi
reviews.reviewText: Please read I hope this helps someone. Sorry, it's long.Returned due to unexplained operation details. I bought this unit over the Atomi due to the brand name, front load filter, and front water refill. Unfortunately, when I received the machine, I figured out very quickly that it was not what I wanted due to how it operated. To explain briefly, I work shifts, so my early morning schedules are on different days of the week. Therefore, when I want to sleep in on my days off, it is on different weekdays every week. This unit does not accommodate this type of use. It only allows for setting a schedule through the app Monday–Sunday without the option to set a delay from the machine itself. Basically, you have to pick between using this machine with a schedule or with voice commands. This was my main issue, as was the fact that to use any smart controls, the “ready to brew” button must be pressed every time for any operation to work. So if you have a schedule set and push “ready to brew” but want to sleep in and use voice controls or the app to turn the machine on, you have to go into the app and turn off the schedule, or it will go off at the set time. The “ready to brew” button ruined the functionality of this machine. For a Monday through Friday worker, this machine would work better. With the Atomi, I just get my coffee ready at night and leave it for voice commands or the app if I want to sleep in, or I just push the delay brew button on the front of the unit for the preset time of delay brew that I set from the unit itself. You can also set a schedule in the app. Basically, the Atomi is "ready to brew" at any time, any day; you just have to tell it to go. So in review:The bad:1) The "ready to brew" button has to be pushed for any operation to work. (Voice commands and delayed brewing) This button ruined the functionality of the machine.2) All operations must be made through the app.3) The power cord is very short.4) Carafe does not like its home. It can be difficult to place back due to the auto stop spring being too long. I think this is the reason for some reviews saying it spills out.5) Essentially, you have to pick to use this machine by voice commands or schedule, not both.6) Don't forget to hit the “ready to brew” button if you want coffee at all.7) NO DELAY BREW BUTTON!The good:To be clear, this coffee maker did work and did its job. They just messed up the fine details to make this a fully functional machine to suit everybody’s needs.1) I like the front-load filter and water refill.2) The carafe seemed sturdy and well made.3) It is best for Monday-Friday workers not rotating shift schedules.Overall, I returned this for the Atomi and like the Atomi 100 percent better. You can set a delay brew from the machine itself, and the unit is ready to work at all times without having to have any "ready to brew" buttons pressed prior to use. The set-up was easy on the Atomi and the time was accurate. Time will tell about the longevity of the Atomi.Take away the “ready to brew” button and have it always ready. Bring back a delay brew button on the machine itself, and this will fit everyone's needs perfectly. All this is just my experience and opinion. I hope it helped someone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Given some of the negative reviews in the coffee maker, I felt compelled to write this one! I received it today (1/25/2024)… I plugged it in and within less than a minute it automatically connected to my WiFi, the clock set immediately! I went to my Alexa app and all was good!! I brewed my 1st pot via the Alexa command and I am enjoying a cup of very hot, delicious Starbuck’s Green Apron Blend coffee!!! Personally, I don’t need an audible beep to tell me my coffee is ready and my coffee doesn’t last 2 hours so that beep is moot as well!! This is an attractive, functual, quiet coffee maker! Great price point too!! Highly recommend! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️☕️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Used daily now for several weeks. No issues. Adding water in front is nice. Easy to program and coffee is just the right temp. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits well under my cabinets. So easy to fill with water and coffee. Brews a good cup of coffee and the price was excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, good coffee!
reviews.reviewText: We had an old Mr Coffee that needed to be replaced after years of service. We decided to give this a try as the timer on the old unit frequently failed. The unit set up quickly and has better construction. Now we can set the timer from the front or from Alexa app or even start making coffee from verbal command as long as we humans load it up before. Simple effective way to bring such an appliance into a smart home. Have it for weeks now and working every morning.👍👍

reviews.reviewTitle: Convenient front-loading coffee maker at a reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: Works very well with a sliding appliance tray (sold separately). Simpler to use than a removable reservoir model. Makes great coffee, has warmer plate to keep coffee hot for two hours and is programmable.
Muy buen producto, calidad y precio
The first 1I bought I have to say the product was good for ten months. After that, it just stopped working. No lights didn't turn on so I had to buy anyone.

Purchased this to see auto brew for the morning, The clock displays the incorrect time even when set to the correct time zone and city. I reset it and it still does the same thing. I set the clock manually and it will just override that to after a few hours. My intent was to use routines at specific times, but this way I’d have to press the button on my app each morning instead of it just doing it all automatically. I purchased mine as Used but it was BRAND NEW every sticker on etc.
